attributes.action: Call an immediate General Election due to no confidence in Liz Truss
attributes.additional_details: Because giving a Tax cut to the wealthy in the middle of a cost of living crisis is just not acceptable. Liz Truss does not represent the majority of the U.K she does not represent  everyday people.
attributes.background: To call an immediate General Election due to no confidence in Liz Truss. In the little time she had been Prime minister she has made the pound collapse while in the middle of a cost of living crisis while giving the wealthy a tax cut

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
